usage.dau_mau.rationale: Stickiness is calculated to be approximately 0.25, indicating a declining trend in user engagement. The 7-day DAU is not stable, which raises concerns about user retention.

actions.action: Analyze user engagement patterns to identify drop-off points
Implement targeted re-engagement campaigns for inactive users
Enhance content offerings based on user feedback

usage.creators_ratio.rationale: The creator share is only 40% out of 5 active users, which is below the target threshold. This indicates a material risk in creator engagement.

actions.action: Identify barriers to creator engagement and address them
Implement incentives for users to become creators
Conduct surveys to understand user needs and motivations

usage.session_depth.rationale: The average session duration and page depth are near target, but there are clear risks due to low repeat frequency for some users.

actions.action: Encourage users with low repeat frequency to engage more frequently
Analyze content engagement to identify areas for improvement

usage.drilldown.rationale: Drill was used in only ~67% of sessions, which is below the target threshold. There are material risks in user engagement and feature utilization.

actions.action: Increase user training on drill features
Analyze user feedback to identify barriers to drill usage
Implement incentives for users to engage with drill features

reliability.refresh_timeliness.rationale: Only 66.67% of dashboards are within their SLA, with one dashboard significantly stale. This indicates material risks to data reliability.

actions.action: Refresh the stale dashboard (kpi_sales) immediately
Implement monitoring for dashboard refresh statuses
Review and adjust refresh schedules for all dashboards

features.cross_links.rationale: Only 2 out of 3 dashboards have links, resulting in a low percentage of 66.67%. The link usage is also limited, indicating material risks in dashboard connectivity.

actions.action: Increase link usage on underutilized dashboards
Identify and implement additional cross-links between dashboards
Monitor link usage trends and adjust strategies accordingly

governance.coverage.rationale: The dashboards have a high certification rate and ownership, with minor gaps in metadata completeness. Two out of three dashboards are certified and owned, and while one lacks metadata, the overall coverage remains strong.

actions.action: Certify the sales dashboard
Assign an owner for the sales dashboard
Complete metadata for the sales dashboard

data.source_diversity.rationale: Five sources across three domains indicate good diversity, with no recent additions noted.

actions.action: Evaluate potential new sources to enhance data diversity

democratization.self_service.rationale: The creator share is 40% (2 out of 5 users), but there is insufficient data on department coverage to assess the breadth of participation. This indicates a material risk in achieving broad engagement.

actions.action: Collect department coverage data for creators
Increase outreach to underrepresented departments

decision.traceability.rationale: Approximately 100% of decisions reference dashboards with strong evidence, indicating a good level of traceability. The evidence is recent and well-documented.

actions.action: Continue to maintain and update dashboards regularly
Encourage more teams to link decisions to dashboards

usage.weekly_active_trend.rationale: The data shows a sustained decline in weekly active users, with only 3 distinct users active in the last week and no activity in the previous weeks. This indicates material risks to user engagement.

actions.action: Investigate reasons for user inactivity and gather feedback
Implement targeted re-engagement campaigns for inactive users
Enhance content offerings based on user preferences

usage.retention_4w.rationale: There are no users returning in the weeks following their initial activity, indicating a significant failure in user retention.

actions.action: Implement a user feedback survey to understand disengagement reasons
Develop a targeted re-engagement campaign for initial users
Analyze user behavior data to identify drop-off points
Enhance onboarding experience to improve initial engagement
Monitor user activity closely for the next cohort

features.export_rate.rationale: Exports and downloads do not occur in any of the recorded sessions, indicating a significant failure in user engagement with these features.

actions.action: Conduct user research to understand barriers to using export/download features
Implement in-product tutorials for exporting/downloading data
Enhance visibility of export/download options in the UI

features.alerts_usage.rationale: There is limited adoption of alerts and subscriptions, with only two users engaging in these actions. However, the delivery of alerts and subscriptions appears to be successful.

actions.action: Increase awareness of alert and subscription features
Provide training sessions for users on how to set up alerts

reliability.sla_breach_streaks.rationale: All critical dashboards have been refreshed on time, with only one dashboard showing a breach of its weekly SLA. This indicates good performance with minor risks.

actions.action: Monitor the refresh schedule for the weekly dashboard to ensure timely updates.

reliability.error_rate_queries.rationale: No error actions were recorded in the provided data, indicating an excellent performance with no material risks.

governance.pii_coverage.rationale: There are significant gaps in PII detection and labeling across the dashboards. Only one dashboard has PII and access markers, while others lack these critical elements.

actions.action: Implement PII labeling and access policies on all dashboards
Certify kpi_sales dashboard and ensure it includes necessary metadata

governance.lineage_coverage.rationale: Strong coverage with minor holes; two dashboards have lineage or glossary documentation, while one lacks any metadata.

actions.action: Ensure all dashboards include either lineage or glossary documentation
Certify the 'kpi_sales' dashboard to improve overall coverage

data.cost_efficiency.rationale: The source mix is strong with a variety of data sources, and while there is one stale dashboard, the overall activity signals indicate minor inefficiencies.

actions.action: Refresh the stale dashboard (kpi_sales) to improve content relevance.

democratization.dept_coverage.rationale: Creators are present in 2 out of 3 departments, which meets the target of 60-79%.

actions.action: Encourage creator role adoption in the Sales department
